title.rendered: Transplant Hero Won the Platinum Award for “Best Mobile App User Interface”

content.rendered:
We are honored to announce that our Transplant Hero App has been selected as a Platinum Award winner of the Best Mobile App Awards, under the category of the “Best Mobile App User Interface”.

The Best Mobile App Awards is committed to showcasing the latest and greatest mobile apps on the market today. The winners of the best mobile app awards are selected by the leaders of the industry who are dedicated to uncovering the next big player in mobile applications.

Transplant Hero is a beautifully created app that helps transplant patients take their medications regularly and on time.

We are happy to know that our work is recognized by professionals!
